name: Royal FrieslandCampina
membership: The company is member of several associations. The most important in the Brussels setting are European Dairy Association (via the Dutch Dairy Association) and EUCOLAIT (via the national association Gemzu), SNE.
goal:
Royal FrieslandCampina is a dairy cooperative active in collecting, processing and distribution of dairy products. The ambition of the company is to provide customers worldwide with healthy , sustainable produced food.
The companies products include dairy based beverages, infant & toddler food, cheese, butter, cream, desserts and functional dairy based ingredients. The company has an annual revenue of about 12,1 billion euro (2017). Offices are around the world and 23 000 people are employed.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Labeling of origin; food law; hygiene regulations; schoolmilk; CAP after 2020. Emergency measures in relation to market measures; internal market issues; trade policy issues: Non tariff barriers and market opening. EU third countries bilateral agreements
